                        const data = await response.json();

                        if (response.ok) {
                            // Success!
                            showFeedback('success', 'Your message has been sent successfully! We\'ll get back to you soon.');
                            tryCodeForm.reset();

                            // Log success
                            console.log('✅ Contact form submitted successfully:', data.contactId);
                        } else {
                            // Server returned an error
                            showFeedback('error', data.message || data.error || 'Something went wrong. Please try again.');
                            console.error('❌ Server error:', data);
                        }
                    } catch (error) {
                        // Network error
                        showFeedback('error', 'Network error. Please check your connection and try again.');
                        console.error('❌ Network error:', error);
                    } finally {
                        // Hide loading state
                        showLoading(false);
                    }
